```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(xlsx)
library(car)
Uninsured <- readxl::read_xlsx("UninsuredState.xlsx")
```

```{r}
head(Uninsured)
```

```{r}
mod1 = lm(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~Uninsured$`% College Grad`)
summary(mod1)
mod2 = lm(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~ Uninsured$`% Child in Family`)
summary(mod2)
mod3 = lm(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~Uninsured$`% HIU Income 400% FPL`)
summary(mod3)
```

```{r}
plot(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~Uninsured$`% College Grad`)
abline(mod1)
```

```{r}
plot(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~ Uninsured$`% Child in Family`)
abline(mod2)
```


```{r}
plot(Uninsured$`Percent Uninsured`~Uninsured$`% HIU Income 400% FPL`)
abline(mod3)
```
